org.universAAL.ri.api.manager.server.persistence

Class PersistenceDerby

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.universAAL.ri.api.manager.server.persistence.PersistenceDerby
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistence

    public class PersistenceDerby
extends Object
implements Persistence
    An implementation of the Persistence interface using Apache Derby SQL Database.
    Author:
    alfiva

      Sets up the underlying database, creating any tables if not present before, and performing any mainenance operations.

      Maintenance method that removes all stored data from all tables that was introduced more than @param millis ago.

      Eliminate all persisted info (node registration, subscribers and callees) of a remote node
      void restore()
      Restore in the R-API implementation (and consequently in the MW) all the persisted information (registration, subscribers and callees) for all nodes.

      • restore

        public void restore()
        Description copied from interface: Persistence
        Restore in the R-API implementation (and consequently in the MW) all the persisted information (registration, subscribers and callees) for all nodes.
        Specified by:
        restore in interface Persistence

      • removeOlderThan

        public void removeOlderThan(Long millis)
        Maintenance method that removes all stored data from all tables that was introduced more than @param millis ago. Removal is not accurate to the millisecond, it rounds to the day.
        Parameters:
        millis - Minimum age, in milliseconds, at which the data will be removed (data older than this will be removed)

      • storeUserPWD

        public void storeUserPWD(String id,
                         String pwd)
        Description copied from interface: Persistence
        Store a new user-password pair for later authentication. There is no "change" method for this, so any change will require manual modification of the persistence.
        Specified by:
        storeUserPWD in interface Persistence
        Parameters:
        id - User
        pwd - Password

      • checkUserPWD

        public boolean checkUserPWD(String id,
                            String pwd)
        Description copied from interface: Persistence
        Method that checks the proper authentication of a persisted user-password pair.
        Specified by:
        checkUserPWD in interface Persistence
        Parameters:
        id - User
        pwd - Password
        Returns:
        true if pwd matches the initially stored value and no errors occured

      • checkUser

        public boolean checkUser(String id)
        Description copied from interface: Persistence
        Check if a user is already persisted with an associated password pair.
        Specified by:
        checkUser in interface Persistence
        Parameters:
        id - to check
        Returns:
        true if there is already a user-password pair persisted.
